column2: English Feasibility Questions
Does Facility have downstream stormdrain collection system?
Does Facility have medium or low risk of groundwater (high groundwater makes bmp infeasible)?
Does Facility have medium or low risk of groundwater, which may necessitate dewatering?
Does Facility have soils other than rock soils, which would increase cost of the BMP installation?
Does Facility have soils other than rock soils, which would make the BMP infeasible?
Does Facility have soils other than clay soils, which would make the BMP infeasible?
Does Facility have existing catch basins?
Is there an upstream collection system?
Is there high likelihood of 3-phase power at the Facility?
Does Facility have a downstream sewer collection system?
Does Facility have slopes less than 8%?
If there is no upstream collection system, can one be easily installed?
Does Facility potentially have space to install?
Does Facility have more unpaved space (SF) than the required BMP size?
Is there sufficient space for stormwater detention?
Does Facility have Area of Exposed Materials > 0 square feet?
Does Facility have Area of Damaged Pavement > 0 square feet?
Is the Facility outside of a closed or Active Landfill?
Is the Facility outside of 100-year storm flood plain?
Is runoff type appropriate for sheet-flow treatment
Is Facility clear of existing structural BMPs
